pages.text: Like its kin, the $(thing)Aerwhale King$() of the $(thing)Aether's Platinum Dungeon$() is typically peaceful. Unless you destroy its $(item)Songstone$() that is. When it's broken, the $(thing)Aerwhale King$() will attack the perpetrator the only way it knows how - slamming its entire body weight down in attempt to crush them. If you manage to dodge this reckless slam, you'll have a window of opportunity in which you can hurt it.
